Name: Isaiah Bradley
Description: Isaiah Bradley was an African-American solider that was turned into a super-soldier by Project: Rebirth and grandfather of the Patriot.
FirstComicDescription: In the tradition of ORIGIN, Marvel reveals the shocking secret history of Captain America! In 1940 there was a man who had many of the same qualities as Steve Rogers - save for one, the color of his skin - and TRUTH is his story!
